page.title: 04TRANSPORT
page.content: A 100 of the children at Clipston School were asked to fill in a transport questionnaire. These are the results: 94% of the children belonged to a family with a car. 57% belonged to families with more than one car. 70% of the children said their fathers used the car to get to work. 48% have mothers who use a car to get to work. 36% of the children come to school on the school bus. 6% of the children belong to families who use the bus service regularly. This questionnaire plus a local bus timetable proved to us that to live in a village like Clipston in the 1980's people needed a car, as to get out of the village using the existing bus service was quite difficult. The buses do not run very frequently. }
